title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**About the role**


We are now looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer with a passion for technology to join our Digital Solutions department in Gothenburg. We are a small, but growing team consisting of a group of dedicated IT-enthusiasts, working with developing and maintaining our web based in-house tools.


The tasks are varied and includes:

* Developing business-related IT systems.
* Building and maintaining scalable applications.
* Design and build REST API's.
* Develop and improve our Cloud infrastructure.
* Troubleshooting issues related to systems developed or operated by IT department and perform bug fixing.

**What we seek**


Besides having several years of experience within Software Development, we believe you are a communicative person who enjoys working together with others. You also have the ability to be self-driven and take your own responsibility and can be described as analytical and solution oriented.


Additional requirements:

* At least 5 years’ experience in software development
* Knowledge of frameworks such as Django, Flask, Laravel or such
* Experience in working with APIs and implementing integrations
* Fluent English language, both written and verbal


Meritorious:

* Python
* JavaScript
* Knowledge in server management and operations
* AWS, Azure or such
* Docker, Jenkins
* GIT
* Swedish language

**What We Offer**

* Opportunity to work with innovative and high-quality products.
* Continuous professional development and career opportunities.
* An exciting and challenging position in a growing organization.
* 8 extra working days off per calendar year through shorter working hours.
* SEK 3,000 per year for wellness care.

***About Allgon***

*Allgon is a Swedish company specializing in industrial radio control with an impressive history of developing advanced wireless technology. Our customers know us through the brands Tele Radio and Åkerströms. Through an ever-growing network of subsidiaries, Allgon now employs more than 400 individuals in over 19 countries.*

*Allgon offers challenging work in a profitable, dynamic, and growing technically-oriented organization. You will work in a pleasant environment and have the opportunity for career development. We are a global company, but with the familiar feeling of a smaller company, where you can be seen and heard and have an opportunity to influence the projects you work on.*

*At Allgon, we prioritize sustainability on all levels – ecologically, socially, and financially. We strive to attract passionate individuals who share our values and want to be part of our journey towards a sustainable future through what we produce and generate for our customers worldwide.*


We look forward to your application!

title: Salesforce Developer - Integrations team
description:
**Hey Salesforce enthusiast - this one is for you!**
----------------------------------------------------

**Join our amazing integrations team as a specialist within Salesforce and experience the power of a growing Scale-up company with BIG ambitions for the future! We’re looking for someone who’s passionate about building innovative Salesforce solutions and driving impactful projects.**

#### **Being a Salesforce Developer at GetAccept**

First of all, let me tell you about GetAccept! So, GetAccept is a digital sales room that helps companies all around the world to close more deals by offering smart functionality related to deal management, sales enablement and e-signing. Our customers can use GetAccept as a stand-alone solution or as an integrated solution in their current CRM system. **This is where you come in!** Our Integrations team is our heroes working on our most important integrations to our strategic partners such as Salesforce and Hubspot.


As a Salesforce Developer you will focus on our most powerful integration and elevate our solution within the Salesforce system. You will work in close contact with our Engineering Manager (integrations), Product Manager, designers, technical support and sometimes our customers to be able to understand the business need and together create a unique integration that brings value for our users!

#### **What you will do**

* Create value for our customers by expanding the capabilities of our Deal Room product natively within Salesforce
* Participate in solution design, implementation and delivery efforts related to our Salesforce integration
* Lots of coding! Maintain our existing codebase and implement new features
* Deploy new functionality as part of regular Managed Package releases to the AppExchange
* Explore and leverage Salesforce’s new features as they’re released
* Provide technical input on engineering and architecture discussions
* Troubleshoot and/or gather insights with our customers to enhance solutions
* Work together with a highly effective Integration team focused on making an impact within the company

#### **Your team**


You will be a part of our integration team and work together with Samer, Bohuslav, Emil, Valik, Aneira, Camilo and James - all happy people dedicated to developing a world-class product! You will be a part of our RnD department and with other developers, product managers, testers and designers and together revolutionize the future of online business.

**Meet some great people at GetAccept!**

#### 

**What we offer you**

* **A unique opportunity:** Be part of a team building a quality and innovative Salesforce integration which has already won several SF Demo Jams.
* **A great company culture:** Experience the power of #teamwins in an environment that celebrates ambition, inclusivity, collaboration, and having fun along the way.
* **Flexible workplace: H**ybrid approach to split your time between home and office and flexible work hours.
* **Global impact**: Contribute to a platform used by revenue teams worldwide.
* **A lovely team and a c****ollaborative environment****: .** We help each other, always strive to develop personally and professionally and we prioritize being personal and creating strong relationships! We are dedicated to solving challenges and driving success.
* **Here is a video to give you a sneak peak about life at GetAccept;**

#### **Who are you?**

* You have good communication skills and the ability to work with administrators, business analysts, and other developers to implement solutions
* Degree in related field, for example IT
* Two (or more) years of experience in Salesforce development and good knowledge of Apex, LWC and SOQL
* Ability to quickly learn new features, releases, or changes to the platform
* Structured and self-driven, with a focus on taking ownership of your work and continuous improvement
* Business level English is a requirement, any other language is a plus!


As a colleague we believe that you are humble, curious and adaptable to change. Being a rapidly expanding SaaS-company means that we are fast-paced, always striving forward and eager to develop. To thrive and love this position, we believe that you are open-minded, eager to grow and - like us - believe in teamwork!

 **We use ongoing selection for this recruitment and have no end date, so apply today!**

*Curious to know more? Say hello to us in the chat or apply and let's continue the dialogue!*

title: Software Developer - Aimo Customer solutions
description:
*We have embarked on an exciting new journey where our goal is to be the most attractive partner in mobility. We want to contribute to healthy and sustainable social development by offering mobility services that make cities smarter and everyday life easier.*

### **About the job**


We are looking for a Software Developer (Frontend/Backend) to join our team building an amazing new mobile app and its microservices environment to bring exciting new products and services to our users throughout the Nordics. You will be collaborating with our skilled architects, full-stack, front-end, and back-end developers located across multiple locations in the Nordics (Finland and Sweden) and Europe.

### **Our Key Technologies**

* TypeScript / JavaScript
* React, React Native
* GraphQL
* Java Spring Boot, NodeJS
* MongoDB
* Kubernetes, Docker
* AWS, Azure AD B2C
* Gitlab
* Jira, Slack

### **About You**


You will most likely start working with either the frontend or backend stack and from there develop yourself to take on a role as a great full-stack developer, contributing to an end-to-end stream of a product feature. You participate in technical discussions and help your team members succeed. You will collaborate closely with peers and the Product Owner to bring solutions to market. We see that you have a strong sense of ownership of what you produce. Not only do you care about the code, as you should, but you also take great pride in the product you build and how the users interact with it.

### **Need to have:**

* (As a Frontend) Hands-on experience working with React Native / React
* (As a Frontend) Hands-on experience in TypeScript/JavaScript
* (As a Backend) Hands-on experience working with Java Spring Boot/NodeJS
* (As a Backend) Knowledge of microservices and event-driven architecture
* Experience with GraphQL
* Experience with NoSQL databases
* At least 3 years of professional experience in either frontend or backend

### **Nice to have:**

* Knowledge of API Gateway / Backend for Frontend pattern
* Experience working with cloud services, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure
* Experience working with mobile application development lifecycles and delivery
* Knowledge of Infrastructure as Code (IaaC)
* Knowledge of identity services, OAuth2, OIDC
* Experience with GitLab pipelines

### **Join us**


If you're looking for a role where your work directly enhances the customer experience, we offer a space where you can share your expertise, learn from others, and contribute to building a stable, secure, and cost-efficient product with great CX as the target. If you're ready to apply your skills in a setting that values collaboration and a servant leadership mindset, we'd like to hear from you.

### **About us**


We are owned by the Japanese company Sumitomo Corporation. With a focus on innovation and human needs, Sumitomo works continuously to develop new mobility solutions and innovations that make people's everyday lives easier.


This role is located at our headquarters in **Stockholm**, and you need to be able to be on-site when the business requires it.


Aimo is now facing an exciting journey of change where we strive to become the most innovative company in the industry. With us, you will get to participate in creating something new!

title: Developer - Dimensioning Tool Lead
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


PEU RAN Performance is the R&D team that secures that Ericsson’s maintains and gains RAN market share through world-leading network performance, winning benchmark activities and being recognized by operators as best performing network. The PEU has design ownership for 5G BB SW products and is a global organization located mainly in Kista, Lund, Beijing, Austin, and Ottawa.

  

The RAN Systems unit within PEU RAN Performance leads our baseband systemization strategy for Ericsson radio network products and drives overall radio network performance to secure technology leadership. The RAN Systems consists of four sections covering the Analytics, Capacity/Performance, RN Guidelines & OTA testing and RAN Functions/Strategy areas. These sections are mainly based in Kista.


We are now looking for a RAN dimensioning methods & tool lead within the RN Guidelines team. The responsibility includes development of RAN dimensioning methods & tools for 5G and their evolvement into 6G deployment scenarios. This includes Ericsson RAN products, end-user services & device capabilities.


As a development lead in this area, you will work closely with the RAN Dimensioning experts in both Product Line and R&D for requirements on new features & tool capabilities that are in a later phase used in the Market Areas (MAs) supporting tenders and customer engagements.  

  

You will drive and coordinate the development of an established RAN dimensioning tool with a graphical end-user interface, as well supporting how analytical dimensioning methods can be implemented & delivered according to Market Area needs.

 **What you will do:**

* Work with MAs and Product Line to collect requirements, making sure that future RAN evolution and needs are captured in dimensioning tools to support customer engagements
* Plan and execute on dimensioning tool development
* Hands-on coding and implementation of requirements (features and capabilities)
* Plan and coordinate tool needs & development with Ericsson Research and Technology & Standards
* Document implementation, ensure the delivered quality together with other RAN dimensioning experts and presentations to the MA dimensioning community

 **The skills you bring:**

* Education: Master of Science or higher
* Excellent knowledge of RAN Dimensioning principles (air interface coverage & capacity)
* Excellent MATLAB programming skills and experience of RAN modelling
* Excellent Excel skills including VBA programming
* General SW development skills (experience in Angular, Java preferred)
* Experience from Tool Management
* Developed leadership skills with the ability to coach drive development teams
* Excellent ability to operate in a cross-organizational environment
* Service-minded attitude
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Are you passionate about creating a great gaming experience and developing a scalable product?** **Come help us build the best geography game! You will be a part of a team with huge impact, shaping the experience for our amazing 85 million players.**

  

At GeoGuessr we do more than create games, since 2013, we have crafted a game that turns the world into a playground for the curious and knowledge-hungry. During the last couple of years we have focused on building an incredible team, now 60 people, and craft new ways for our dedicated players to experience our fantastic geography games. GeoGuessr is widely played all around the world and have a large and dedicated community.

 **The role**


We're looking for a developer to join our tech organisation. You will be part of a cross-functional team responsible for delivering a great game experience backed by high-quality code. Here you iterate an idea in the morning with the team, write the solution during the day and ship it to our millions of players in the afternoon.


You communicate freely with your colleagues as well as our awesome community.

  

You understand the value of bringing daily improvements and new features to our millions of players. You just get the player perspective and use the technical tools you possess to balance player satisfaction with technical functionality.

 **What we hope you’ll bring:**

* Solid programming skills in React, TypeScript min 3 years experience.
* Passion for delivering functionality across the entire stack.
* Sense of when it's applicable for short cuts, and when one needs to build a long term solution.
* Familiarity with modern development concepts like CI/CD, testing, etc.
* A university degree in computer science

**It's extra nice if you bring:**

* UX and design
* 3D (WebGL/Three.js)
* Motion and sound
* Game development experience
* C# or similar

**Wait, there's more!**


We're offering a package of perks to keep you charged up and ready to create wonders:

* Daily breakfast and lunch at the office.
* 6 weeks of vacation + 3 extra days off, for a well-deserved rest.
* Pension and insurance as per ITP1 guidelines.
* 50,000 SEK education benefit.
* 5,000 SEK wellness allowance.
* A high energy and very much alive office.


We encourage exercise during working hours. We provide a large selection of snacks and drinks for recovery. A home to simply enjoy.

  

This role is based in Stockholm where we have invested in creating our unique home at Katarinavägen 17, in the glass house by Slussen.  

  

or equivalent experience *(Higher Vocational Education (Yrkeshögskola) may be sufficient only if compensated trough extensive work experience).*

title: Software Engineer (API developer)
description:
* Applications are considered on a rolling basis
* Kista
* Hybrid
**Job Description**
-------------------


*Are you passionate about APIs and ready to shape the future of API management? Join us to work with cutting-edge technology, drive innovation, and take your skills to the next level!*

Are you ready to be at the forefront of digital innovation? Join our dynamic team at Tele2, where Digital Capabilities & Technology (DCT) is the engine behind our products and services. As the essential enabler of our commercial



ambitions, DCT brings automation and simplicity to the telecommunications industry, revolutionizing the way we connect and communicate.  

Within our organization, you’ll find everything from the backbone infrastructure of technology and IT systems, serving both our external & internal customers, to advanced analytics, AI creation, and frontend development. Our team plays a vital role in ensuring reliable and premium services through delivering exceptional experiences to our end customers, both Consumer and Enterprises, all the while supporting our colleagues within Tele2.


**About the job**



You will be a part of the API Team that enables customers to access Tele2 services via APIs from the frontend channels. Together, we provide a great experience for our customers, both consumers and business customers, by providing data that they need to have. We provide services for enabling data to be consumed by other applications and systems. We control and manage our services from start to end. By joining our team, you will be a part of a culture where teamwork and inclusion are leading the way forward.


**Your tasks and responsibilities** **will include (but not be limited to)****:**

* Develop and maintain our services that are carried out from Azure and on-premises
* Developing and maintaining APIs that are built in .Net
* Manage and maintain Azure API Management
* Manage and maintain Backstage
* Communicating and supporting to a lot of stakeholders since we are a central component
* Act as specialist support to the whole organization around API management
* Transfer your great skills to the team and learn new great skills from others
* Following patterns that we believe promote good and robust services and pushing the team to be even better

**Who are you?**



To be successful in this role, we believe you have a jack of all trades with a liking for the bird's eye perspective. You are driven by the desire to be involved, exert influence, and create an impact - while prioritizing robustness and security.


To thrive in this role, we believe that you have:


* Previous experience from API development in .Net
* Experience of Azure or working in cloud platforms
* Knowledge of Docker, deploy pipelines and Kubernetes terminology
* Some experience in JavaScript/React for working with Backstage
* Basic knowledge of security concepts (encryption with keys, SSL / TLS, HTTPS)
* A curious mindset
**Great Place to Work**
-----------------------


* Pension and health care
* Hybrid and flexible work life balance
* Career opportunities
* Parental benefit
* Employee benefits and Tele2 discounts
* Inclusive workplace
* Stora utbildningsmöjligheter
* Tydliga karriärvägar och utvecklingsmöjligheter
* Lön och försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
* Generöst förmånspaket
* Inkluderande arbetskultur där alla är välkomna
* Rabatter på Tele2s produkter och tjänster
* Convenient parking next to our office in Kista
* Leading in technology
* Tjänstepension
* Möjlighet till interna karriärvägar och utveckling
* Lön och försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal
* Inkluderande arbetskultur
* Rabatter på Tele2s produkter och tjänster
* Föräldralön
**Skills & Requirements**
-------------------------


**A few words from the manager**


*I’m Per Gustavsson and I’m the manager for the API team. In our diverse team we have an open atmosphere where everyone’s opinions are equally important. We believe that innovative ideas come from tight collaboration and including culture and that makes us to grow, both individually and as a team.*

*We* *are an**autonomic* *team that encourages each other to be brave, and we have ownership of our code and take responsibility for our work from start to end; however in-between it is room for* *laughs* *and to have fun, while efficiency always is in focus.*


**Why Tele2**


* We believe in fostering a creative and flexible work environment. You will be part of a culture where teamwork and inclusion are leading the way forward, a place where you bring your whole self to work as the unique person you are. We are committed to building a company that values diversity in all its forms.
* Every employee is important for the company’s success and you will always have an impact through your work with opportunities for growth and development through internal paths.
At Tele2, we work hard to our commitment to lead in sustainability, which has made us the number one climate leader in Europe and we keep reaching new goals as we are bound to shift to a circular economy.  
* 

**Interest and application**  

Would you like to be a part of the Tele2s value-driven and including culture? Then hit the “apply now” button and let’s find out if we’re a match!


Please note that in compliance with personal data management regulations (GDPR), we are unable to accept CVs via email.
  

As a step in the recruitment process, Tele2 performs a background check on final candidates.


**Work with great people**
--------------------------


Emma
Digital Capabilities & Technology
*"Everyone at Tele2 always aim for the stars in order to create unlimited possibilities."*
Marika
Head of IT Operational Excellence
*"We’re serious about what we do, and we get things done."*
Emma
Digital Capabilities & Technology
*"På Tele2 siktar vi högt för att skapa obegränsade möjligheter"*
Marika
Head of IT Operational Excellence
*"Vi är ambitiösa i det vi gör, och vi får saker gjorda."*
**About the company**
---------------------


At Tele2 we work hard to fulfill our commitment to lead in sustainability being named the number one climate leader in Europe by The Financial Times and we keep reaching new goals as we are bound to shift to a circular economy.


We take great pride in delivering customer value by being Reliable, Insight Driven and Collaborative. We call it the Tele2 Way.

title: Senior Frontend utvecklare
description:
**Sätt din prägel på framtidens digitala upplevelser!**

  

Är du en kreativ och passionerad Frontend-utvecklare som älskar att skapa engagerande användarupplevelser och arbeta med kunder? Vill du arbeta med de senaste teknologierna och samtidigt påverka hur våra produkter och tjänster ser ut och känns? Då är du den vi söker!

**Om rollen:**


Som Frontend-utvecklare hos oss kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i att förvandla idéer och koncept till interaktiva, användarvänliga och visuellt imponerande webblösningar. Du kommer att samarbeta nära vårt design- och backend-team för att skapa dynamiska och skalbara applikationer som driver vår verksamhet framåt.

**Vad vi erbjuder:**

* **Innovativ miljö**: Vi arbetar med de senaste teknologierna inom designverktyg, frontendramverk, styling och vi älskar att experimentera med nya lösningar.
* **Flexibilitet och frihet**: Arbeta var du vill – vi erbjuder flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet till distansarbete.
* **Utveckling**: Få möjlighet att växa i din roll och hålla dig uppdaterad med det senaste inom frontend-utveckling genom vidareutbildningar och workshops.
* **Påverkan**: Din röst och dina idéer är viktiga – här får du vara med och forma både produkter och processer.

**Vem är du?**

* Du har erfarenhet av **HTML5**, **CSS3**,**SASS**, **JavaScript**,**TypeScript** och moderna frontend-ramverk som **Svelte**, **React**, **Vue** etc.
* Du har ett öga för detaljer och kan omvandla designmockups till pixelperfekt kod.
* Du brinner för användarupplevelse och gillar att hitta innovativa lösningar på problem.
* Erfarenhet av **responsiv design**, **API-integration**, **usability**, **WCAG** och förståelse för **UX/UI-principer** är ett stort plus.

**Ansök nu!**


Gör skillnad i ett företag där din kreativitet och tekniska skicklighet får lysa. Skicka in din ansökan och bli en del av vårt passionerade team som tillsammans skapar framtidens digitala upplevelser!

title: Senior .Net utvecklare
description:
**Bli en nyckelspelare i vårt utvecklingsteam!**


Är du en erfaren .NET-utvecklare som brinner för att skapa robusta och innovativa lösningar? Vill du vara en del av ett framgångsrikt och växande företag där din tekniska skicklighet och kreativitet verkligen kan göra skillnad? Då vill vi höra från dig!

**Om rollen:**


Som .NET-utvecklare hos oss kommer du att få möjlighet att arbeta med avancerade applikationer och system som gör verklig skillnad för våra kunder. Du kommer att spela en central roll i att utveckla nya funktioner och förbättra befintliga lösningar, allt med fokus på kvalitet, säkerhet och prestanda.

**Vad vi erbjuder:**

* **Teknisk utmaning och utveckling**: Arbeta med den senaste tekniken inom **.NET Core**, **ASP.NET**, **Azure** och **microservices**.
* **Innovativ och kreativ miljö**: Vi värdesätter dina idéer och ger dig möjlighet att påverka både arkitektur och utvecklingsprocesser.
* **Flexibla arbetsvillkor**: Vi erbjuder flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet att arbeta på distans, så att du kan balansera arbete och privatliv.
* **Professionell utveckling**: Vi investerar i din kompetens och erbjuder utbildningar, kurser och konferenser för att du ska fortsätta växa i din roll.

**Vem är du?**

* Du har erfarenhet av **C#**, **.NET Framework**, **.NET Core** och **ASP.NET MVC**.
* Erfarenhet av **databashantering** (SQL Server, Entity Framework) och molnbaserade tjänster som **Azure** är en fördel.
* Du har god förståelse för **testdriven utveckling** (TDD), **CI/CD-pipelines** och versionshanteringsverktyg som **Git**.
* Du är lösningsorienterad, analytisk och har ett stort intresse för att utveckla skalbara och säkra system.

**Ansök nu och ta nästa steg i din karriär!**


Vi söker en passionerad .NET-utvecklare som vill vara med och bygga morgondagens lösningar. Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och arbeta i ett kreativt och kompetent team? Skicka in din ansökan idag!

title: Senior Java- utvecklare
description:
- Vill du arbeta med ett gäng glada och trevliga människor i Halmstads mest innovativa och centrala nav kring mjukvaruutveckling? Brinner du för att leverera i interna produktteam eller som specialistkonsult?
  

  

**Vilka är vi?**

Vi är ett IT-konsultföretag som främjar en kultur där medarbetarna känner sig trygga, inspirerade och glada. Vi tror att detta är den bästa miljön där människor kan växa och bygga de bästa produkterna. Vi grundades år 2000, ser långsiktigt på våra kund- och medarbetarrelationer och hoppas du ska vilja stanna länge hos oss.


Visste du att vi faktiskt också grundade utvecklarkonferensen Øredev?

  
**Vad får du?**

Vi erbjuder dig individuell och betald kompetensutveckling på arbetstid, flexibelt arbete och ett generöst förmånspaket. Hos oss får du vara med och påverka allt från vilket uppdrag som känns rätt för dig till hur du väljer att utveckla din kompetens.
  

  

**Vem är du?**

Vi tror att du har 5+ års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling, är en nyfiken och ödmjuk person samt en lagspelare. Du gillar också att dela med dig av din kunskap på ett sätt som passar dig bra.
  

  

**Arbetsplats**  

Halmstad med omnejd


  
**För denna roll krävs det att du är flytande i svenska språket i tal och skrift, samt är villig att arbeta i Halmstad med omnejd 2-5 dagar i veckan.**  

  

**Du kommer att arbeta med:**

* Java SE/EE
* Spring Framework/Spring Boot
* API:er
* Git
* Agila utvecklingsmetoder
* Molnteknologier - AWS, GCP eller Azure.

**Du kommer ha möjlighet att arbeta med:**

* Microservices
* DevOps
* CI/CD
* Containers (Docker/Kubernetes)

  
- **Vill du veta mer?**

Skicka in din ansökan till oss så kontaktar vi dig så snart som möjligt. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!


**En rättvis chans.**

Devoteam är öppet för ansökningar från alla delar av samhället. Vi tror att olikheter inom team hjälper oss att skapa bättre produkter. Vi välkomnar alla människor oavsett ålder, könsidentitet eller uttryck, erfarenhet och bakgrund. Om du kan se dig själv i denna roll och känner att denna tjänst kan tillföra värde både för dig och för Devoteam, uppmuntrar vi dig att skicka in din ansökan till oss - även om du inte nödvändigtvis uppfyller alla ovanstående krav.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Software Engineer (Java)
description:
**Company Description**
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.
   

  

 This is a full-time position with placement in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

**Job Description**
 H&M is reshaping the future of promotions and customer incentives at a global scale! We are driving a major transformation across all our channels, involving significant architectural improvements, and unlocking endless business opportunities. Join us in redefining the tech landscape and delivering innovative solutions that make an impact worldwide.
   

  

 You will be part of one of our dedicated product teams, collaborating closely with colleagues to bring these transformations to life. You are passionate about programming and take pride in delivering high-quality, polished solutions. As a developer, you have a genuine interest in the technology you work with, always striving to build a strong tech foundation that supports future ventures. You are eager to be involved in various parts of the development process: from design, build, test, deploy, monitor and maintain.
   

  

 We value teamwork, and we are looking for someone with excellent interpersonal skills who thrives in a dynamic, fun and engaging professional environment. If this sounds exciting, we want to hear from you!
   

  

 Key responsibilities:
   

  

* Building a microservice solution end-to-end at global scale
* Collaborate in defining and refining the solution based on MACH architecture
* Maintain high coding standards and best practices
* Develop automated testing process


**Qualifications**
 What you need to be successful:
   

  

* Hands on experience of end-to-end development in a microservice and cloud environment - from idea, design, build, test, deploy, monitor and running microservices in production
* 2 to 6 years experience in developing and testing applications/components
* Experience with Kubernetes and container technologies, such as Docker
* Advanced level of Java 17+
* Prior working experience with Spring Boot and Spring Framework
* Used to work with microservices and cloud-based architecture
* Test-driven development, and used to write unit, component, integration and performance tests
* Automation through CI/CD pipelines including continuous deployment


 Nice to have:
   

  

* Experience with Azure, GCP
* Infrastructure as code, such as Terraform
* Database experience, such as MySQL


**Additional Information**
 Company Description
   

  

 Shaping the future of fashion with people, data, and tech. The fashion and retail industries are going through a transformation, driven by customers' technology and sustainability expectations. At H&M Group, we want to shape the future of fashion and lifestyle by harnessing the power of smart tech and data. With our 74-year history of innovation, we understand the need to collaborate and co-create with engineers and tech specialists around the world to achieve our vision.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

 You are joining a unique value-driven culture, a large tech network and community where you can be yourself. Besides the obvious perks such as staff discount card, flexible work life, learning communities, wellness benefits, parental benefits etc. you are joining a unique value driven culture, a large tech network and community where you can be yourself. There are endless opportunities to experiment and grow in any direction that you want and when you grow, we grow. Being a major player gives us countless opportunities to make a real impact and shape the future.
   

  

 H&M Group is a value-driven company that wants to lead the way to a more inclusive environment. We are committed to create an inclusive & diverse workplace with a culture that is dynamic and innovative.
   

  

 We welcome your application regardless of who you are, where you’re from and what you like.
   

  

 We welcome applicants with different backgrounds, perspectives, and skills.
   

  

 We welcome all applicants to strengthen our innovative and diverse culture.
   

  

 Learn more about our I&D work https://youtu.be/veRbl9Cijts
   

  

 This is a full-time position based in Stockholm. Please apply as soon as possible but no later than 31st of October. We will review and interview applicants on-going. If you have questions, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Hranda Khrystyna at khrystyna.hranda@hm.com

title: Backend Developer - Distributed Services
description:
Evolution is a multinational business at the forefront of the online gaming industry. We have an extensive track record of number 1s and are always looking for great people to help us create the next big product hit. Our team of 1,000+ engineers operates out of 8 engineering hubs running code 24/7/365 to serve users around the world. This is run through a modern software stack that supports over 250 fully automated releases per month in our main live environment. We believe in building in-house competence and agile work processes so that we can deliver on our Engineering mission:
 *A flawless player experience.*
**Job Description**
 We're expanding our NetEnt Core Platform team in Stockholm and are on the hunt for passionate Software Engineers. You are either already proficient in Scala and functional programming or enthusiastic about learning. In this role, you'll be responsible for backend applications that manage the logic of our 300+ first person casino games, all developed and operated by us at Evolution Group.
   

  

 Our team is committed to developing, maintaining, and enhancing multiple backend applications and libraries that together deliver a high-performance, low-latency gaming experience for our players. We take pride in our well-designed, scalable systems that utilize modern functional programming-based design approaches. We firmly believe that Scala's functional programming approach results in high-performing systems that are simpler to construct and maintain. If you're a passionate Software Engineer looking to make a significant impact in the gaming industry, we'd love to hear from you.
   

  

**You will need to:**
* Be proactive, pragmatic and professional, deliver results
* Write code that make our games and related functionality run
* Write unit and other automated tests
* Work and communicate efficiently with the rest of the development team, including PO, front-end developers and design
* Actively participate in code reviews so that code delivered by you and your team is of great quality
* Own your applications, ensure they deploy and run 24/7 on our Kubernetes platform with great performance
* Be ready to invest the effort to become an even better developer


**Qualifications**
* Have proven experience in delivering production software using Scala, Java or comparable language
* Be familiar with functional/reactive, asynchronous, non-blocking styles of programming
* Passion for our profession and improving yourself technically
* Have a problem solving mindset, including that you are willing to move outside your comfort zone and learn and work with new technologies.
* Excellent communication skills
* Highly proficient in spoken and written English
* Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent


**We will appreciate experience with or wiliness to learn about:**
* Building high performance clustered systems, modular FP-based architecture, as well as actor systems, where they are necessary
* Cats, Cats Effect, ZIO, Monix, Akka Actors, Akka Persistence, Akka Cluster, http4s, Tagless Final
* Event Sourcing & CQRS
* Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka, Cassandra


**Additional Information**
 Exiting opportunity at our brand new office in the heart of Stockholm with amazing colleagues! Join our dynamic international team and be a part of a vibrate work environment where innovation thrives. Embrace the city´s energy as you contribute to our company´s growth!
   

  

 Evolution provides a dynamic and creative work environment with a unique opportunity for the right people to enhance their skills and drive their passion. Our culture is rooted in Evolution’s core values ALIVE, do RIGHT and work TOGETHER and we operate guided by our vision to become the leading supplier of online casino in the world. Apply now and be a key player in our success story!
   

  

**Our Benefits Are**
* Competitive pension and health insurance
* 30 paid vacation days
* Fitness benefit (Friskvårdsbidrag)
* Professional growth
* Sport activities, parties, team buildings

title: Frontend Software Engineer
description:
Location: Stockholm City, Sweden, on site + remote
 



 Form of employment: Full time
 



 Language: English first
 



 Other: You must live within large Stockholm area
 



  





 Our client is a newly started tech company by three ex-Northvolters on a mission to make manufacturing easy. By building the next generation of manufacturing software, they provide an operating system that ensures everyone and everything in a factory works in harmony towards increased productivity, reduced cost, and making production of new hardware as easy as it can get.
 



  





 Todayʼs manufacturing is far from easy. Every product we use has gone through a complex production process. Factories impact every aspect of our lives and the environment, contributing to about 20% of global GDP and employs 15% of the global workforce. Yet, despite its significance, manufacturing seems stuck in the past, with productivity stagnant since around 2010. Moreover, we’re facing a shortage of over 2.1 million factory workers by 2030 in the US alone. Additionally, as pressure mounts on factories to reduce their carbon footprint they need all the tools they can get to help reduce waste and optimize operations. This is crucial for us to move towards a future we can all get excited about.
 



  





 Walking into most manufacturing facilities can be overwhelming for newcomers. It’s like entering a maze of processes, machines, people, and materials, all striving to produce high-quality products. However, more often than not, this symphony of manufacturing operates with discordant notes, leading to confusion and inefficiency.
 



 While other industries have embraced digital solutions over the past two decades, manufacturing has lagged behind. Most factory systems worldwide rely on outdated software technology, making them rigid and difficult to adapt to modern needs.
 



  





 Join us. We’re here to change the game. We believe that simplifying manufacturing means ensuring that everyone and everything in the factory understands their role and has the insights needed to perform optimally. We make collaboration between humans and machines seamless, enabling efficient production of the products the customers want. We empower those who understand the factory best by putting the control in their hands. We are designed to evolve continuously based on the factory’s needs. We believe that the path to the future of manufacturing is a lot like climbing a ladder, it needs to happen step-by-step, and currently the pins are too far apart. We will provide a manufacturing OS that provides a seamless path from ancient software, excel, and paper; into the future. Fully harnessing the potential of industrial AI in connected factories, where everyone has the right information and tools readily available for improving productivity. Something the world really needs.
 



  





 We already have the technology for moving into a sustainable future. Mass-scale manufacturing and raw materials are two of the key bottlenecks in making them readily available, at the right cost. We want to play our part in building an exciting future.
 



  





**The role** 




 We’re a team of five, seeking one of our early hires, a frontend software engineer who thrives in ambiguity and takes initiative. We believe that great products are built by teams where every one is involved in, and takes ownership of, solving real problems for end-users. No tickets are thrown over a fence.
 



  





**What you will do** 




 Work closely with the founders to define and build an outstanding product with a focus on the technical aspects
 



 Write code that will run in factories all over the world
 



 Be an integral part in making key technical- and design decisions and overall user experience
 



 Use modern frameworks and techniques to create fully fledged, real time web applications with high complexity and depth
 



  





**What you bring** 




 We understand that we have high expectations in what to bring, however, whats more important than ticking all the boxes is the willingness to learn and develop with the company.
 



  





 – A can-do attitude and user obsession
 



 – 5 plus years of experience in frontend development, preferably within different sectors and niches
 



 – A mindset to learn the skills required to help taking the company to the next stage
 



 – Experience in building high-availability software
 



 – Experienced with creating frontend-project that go beyond basic web pages and SPA:s – i.e. full interactive application development
 



 – Preferably experienced with Svelte – if not, experience with multiple frontend frameworks (React, Vue.js etc.), and a willingness to learn and adapt to new frameworks
 



 – Detail oriented, experience with implementing designs created in Figma or equivalent
 



 – Focus on writing performant, efficient code from the get-go, not postponing all optimization and code quality concerns to a later stage
 



 – Experience working across the stack. Most likely the focus will be frontend, but as we are a small company we expect you to be able to contribute across different parts of the stack.
 



  





**Cultural fit** 




 Working in a startup with a small team requires certain personal qualities. At Ronja, we believe in a culture of collaboration, adaptability, and proactive problem-solving. You should be comfortable with a dynamic work environment and be ready to roll up your sleeves to help out across different areas as needed. Strong communication skills and a positive attitude are essential to thrive in our team-oriented atmosphere.
 



  





**Benefits** 




 Company warrants
 



 Competitive salary
 



 Hybrid work policy
 



  





**Your application** 




 In english
 



 Send to jens@enkl.se

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Join Mighty as a Front-End Developer!** 

 🚀
 




  





 Are you a skilled Front-End Developer passionate about crafting beautiful and functional user interfaces? Mighty is looking for a full-time developer based in Stockholm (with remote flexibility) who can help us deliver exceptional digital products for our clients.
 



  





 At Mighty, we’re a small team of multidisciplinary experts working with some of the most innovative companies. We extend their design and development teams to create seamless digital experiences. If you thrive in a collaborative environment where every voice matters, this could be the perfect role for you!
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 




  





 • Develop responsive, high-performance front-end applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and popular frameworks like React or Svelte.
 



 • Collaborate closely with UX/UI designers to bring pixel-perfect designs to life, ensuring a smooth user experience across devices.
 



 • Contribute to the continuous improvement of our design systems and front-end architecture.
 



 • Work with cross-functional teams to deliver quality code and innovative solutions that meet business needs.
 



 • Stay on top of the latest front-end trends and technologies to continuously push the boundaries of what’s possible.
 



  





**What We’re Looking For:** 




  





 • 3+ years of experience in front-end development, with a strong understanding of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and modern front-end frameworks like React or Svelte.
 



 • Experience working with design tools like Figma and an ability to collaborate closely with designers.
 



 • Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality, maintainable code.
 



 • A good understanding of responsive design, performance optimization, and web standards.
 



 • Excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
 



 • Experience working in an Agile environment is a plus.
 



  





**Why Mighty?** 




  





 • Be part of a small, agile team where your work has a direct impact.
 



 • Collaborate with leading companies and contribute to high-impact projects.
 



 • Enjoy a supportive, creative, and inclusive work environment.
 



 • Work remotely part of the time with the flexibility to maintain a work-life balance.
 



  





 Excited to join our growing team? 🚀
 



 Apply today and help us build the future of digital product development!

title: Frontend Software Engineer to to major international retail-company!
description:
We are looking for a senior frontend developer to join a exciting team at one of the worlds biggest retail-company! Do you want to specialize in frontend development? Then this role is the perfect next step in your career. Apply now - we use ongoing selection due to startdate!
 


 Apply here!

 Stockholm

 IT

 Full time

 Staffing

title: Software developer within fullstack
description:
**Job Description**
 Do you also want to make the world a little better while devoting yourself to cutting-edge technology development? Then Sigma Industry Development is the right company for you.
   

  

 As a software developer within fullstack at Sigma Industry Development, you will:
   

  

  

* Develop Front-end solutions which are cross-browser compatibility in HTML, CSS, JavaScript using frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js
* Create Back-end solutions using server-side scripting languages like Node.js, Python, Ruby, PHP, etc.
* Ensure back-end functionality using SQL or NoSQL (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL)
* Design and model databases using CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations, including query optimization and database performance tuning
* Deploy, maintain and host servers (e.g., Heroku, AWS, Azure) using different server configurations, API design and application architectures
* Maintain a qualitative version control for source code management
* Use Development Tools such as Development Environments (IDEs), package managers (e.g., npm, pip) and task runners and build tools (e.g., Webpack, Gulp).
* Test and debugg via unit testing and test-driven development, including debugging tools and techniques
* Have a solid knowledge of common security practices and vulnerabilities, but also implementation of secure coding practices


 And remember – besides the unlimited possibilities to engineer cutting-edge technology, you're an addition to our team; you become an integral part of the Sigma family, weaving your unique thread into the intricate tapestry of our company's path forward. Your presence holds the potential to shape our collective journey, infusing it with your skills and perspectives.
   

  

 Welcome to the Sigma family. Your journey starts now, where each line of code etches a mark of your contribution on the canvas of our collective ambition.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
**Education**
* B.Sc. or M.Sc in Computer Science, Information Technology or Computer Engineering


**Know-How**
* Programming Languages - Proficiency in languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Python, Ryby, PHP and others
* Version Control - Using Git and GitHub
* Algorithmic Thinking - Creating efficient algorithms to solve various computational problems
* Software Design Patterns - Understanding and application of common design patterns to create scalable and maintainable code
* Quality Assurance - Skill in defining and conducting unit tests to ensure software quality
* Agile Methodologies - Familiarity with Agile frameworks like Scrum or Kanban for efficient project management


**Linguistics**
* Swedish and English (spoken and written)


**Preferred Additional Skills, Personal Traits And Experience**
 You embody the spirit of a passionate team player, adept at fostering positive interactions through exceptional soft skills. What sets you apart is your unwavering enthusiasm for both professional growth and enjoyment in the process. Just as we do, you believe that learning should be a journey of discovery and excitement.
   

  

 If the realm of AI holds a special place in your interests, consider it an added advantage. We're thrilled at the prospect of delving into the world of artificial intelligence alongside you. Together, we'll nurture and cultivate these skills, turning curiosity into expertise, and evolving with the ever-changing landscape of technology.
   

  

 We offer
   

  

 Sigma Industry Development offers you a platform to shape your future. A company where you can excel in your career and simultaneously contribute to the greater good.

* https://starforlife.org/

**Our core values are**
* Family identity – have fun together and show appreciation.
* Teamplay – engage, learn, and give feedback.
* Gender equality & equal treatment – we are all the same: humans.
* Action – act to excel.


**In Addition, Sigma Offers a Range Of Benefits**
* TGL Group Life Insurance
* Cellphone and subscription
* Additional life & accidents insurance
* Occupational Pension scheme
* Parental salary subsidy
* Wellness contribution
* Flexible working hours
